SELECT B.RES_R_NO, A.L_IMG_PATH, A.LOD_TYPE, A.LOD_NM, B.ROOM_NO, C.ROOM_TYPE, C.ROOM_PRS, B.LOD_START, B.LOD_END FROM LODGING A INNER JOIN RES_LOD B ON(A.LOD_CODE = B.LOD_CODE) INNER JOIN ROOMS C ON(B.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO)
WHERE B.USER_ID =#{user_id} AND TO_CHAR(B.LOD_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
